There are more than 3000 slot machines at US military installations around the world, but the @DeptofDefense doesn't systematically screen for gambling disorder. That's dangerous for our servicemembers' health & well-being, & our national security. But I've got a bill for that.

RT @AOC Today I am joining @repblumenauer and @SenSanders in pushing Congress to acknowledge the climate emergency.

The US isn’t leading on climate, and we must. Let’s join the four leading nations & 740 local governments that have declared a climate emergency.

https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2019/jul/08/climate-crisis-sanders-ocasio-cortez-emergency?CMP=Share_iOSApp_Other

“Catfight” is the sexist term Republicans use when two adult women happen to disagree with each other.

The reason they find it so novel &exciting is bc the GOP haven’t elected enough women themselves to see that it can, in fact, be a normal occurrence in a functioning democracy. https://twitter.com/nypost/status/1148665887458824192 QT @nypost Kellyanne Conway mocks 'huge catfight' between Pelosi and AOC https://nypost.com/2019/07/09/kellyanne-conway-mocks-huge-catfight-between-pelosi-and-aoc/?utm_medium=SocialFlow&utm_source=NYPTwitter&utm_campaign=SocialFlow http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D_DhiWRWwAAiEUU.jpg

Republicans are still trying to eliminate the Affordable Care Act. They couldn't do it through Congress because the American people rose up. Now they are going through the courts. Our job: keep up the pressure and stop them from kicking millions of people off their health care. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1148619706246545409 QT @nytimes Medicaid? Pre-existing conditions? Coverage limits? Here's a look at how striking down the Affordable Care Act would affect tens of millions of Americans. https://trib.al/64vBW3Y

Health care is a basic human right, and we fight for basic human rights. That’s why I support #MedicareForAll so families don’t go broke while begging insurance companies to get the care they need. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJo-WmwXgAALXuB.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/908102531712208896/vid/320x180/gxWz62WMyzJe8ruo.mp4
